name: SnapShotBoard WordPress Plugin
author: Grizzly New Technologies GmbH

sections.description:
Easily integrate your SnapShotBord in your WordPress-Site.

This plugin relies on a 3rd party service („SnapShotBoard“) which is operated by Grizzly New Technologies GmbH, Mondscheingasse 6, 8010 Graz, Austria (the author of this PlugIn).

Information about the service can be found at https://about.snapshotboard.com/

Privacy Information can be found at https://about.snapshotboard.com/datenschutz/
sections.changelog:
0.2.1: Ticker switched to new Wall (V2)
0.2.0: Switched to new Wall (V2)
0.1.9: ReadMe issues
